x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.description: This fix script makes the actions field non mandatory for upgrade scenarios. Further to this change, there is a UI policy which will make the field conditionally mandatory.
x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.name: Actions actionablecontent non mandatory
